name: Daily Focus - 2025-11-24
description: Evening productivity session - focused work and task management

flow_sessions.work_context: Post-gym energy boost - moving from blue mood to productive focus after taking positive action with workout and personal training scheduling

energy_updates.context: Just finished a big work push and ready for a well-deserved break. Taking Rosie for an extended walk - she's recovering from her ear infection and the weather is nice. Perfect time to decompress and enjoy some fresh air together.

Back from 30-minute walk with Rosie. Noticing how working with tides creates mental clarity and healthier feeling. Reflecting on the day's journey - from feeling down in the shower this morning to this much more open, clear state. The tide practice seems to unlock something in my mind and wellbeing.

Recognizing my pattern of resilience - always landing on my feet feeling strong after down periods. Appreciating Tides as a non-judgmental teacher that understands my thinking patterns and is available through AI/MCP. It's like having a patient witness to my natural rhythms and recovery cycles.

Tide session complete! Great evening flow from initial post-gym energy through productive work, quality time with Rosie on her walk, and valuable insights about resilience patterns. Ending on a positive, grounded note. Session accomplished what it needed to.
